name: Sylvia Gill
text: The food was fantastic!! First time having the wings..I got the unsauced and they were the best! Will be ordering again soon..Keep up the good work 😊

name: Jhamari Hogan
text: Really enjoy these guys. They have good customer service, they ate always working hard and it does not go unnoticed. Last but not least they support the military with discounts. The manager always tries to help me out since I'm military and I could not appreciate it more. Thank you guys!

name: Doc Jon
text: Typical pizza place...food was made promptly and it appeared clean inside.

name: tommy liberati
text: Phone in take out order was a disaster. Person taking order acted like it was a foriegn language. Then you finally get that taken care of they tell you 30 minutes right at an hour later you finally get your 3 pizzas and cheese sticks amazing...even better get your order home and it's wrong great service

text: Easily online ordering, fast delivery, courteous staff, rewards program is very nice, great pizza but a little pricey

text: First we called to see if they would deliver,, said no because others had give them a hard  time or something similar. So we ordered a pizza and bread sticks, she said that will be 24 dollars and change. So my husband asked if I got a …More

text: Sunday picked up 2 large pizzas and order breadsticks, worse Papajohns we ever had 😕 will never order from this place again, breadsticks were good.

name: Braydie
text: Appreciate that the order could be delivered to a hospital. I requested a midnight delivery and was told it WOULD be delivered at midnight. The order was meant as a gift for midnight-shift medical workers who have lunch break at 1:00 a.m. …More

text: Needs to expand delivery  routes so that surrounding areas  can enjoy papa John pizza

name: John Martin
text: Love the food and prices but the online system needs work, It kept sending me back to buy more specials when i was ready to check out so instead i ordered dominoes.

name: Jacqueline Burnside
text: I placed an order online, and it somehow got sent to a different store.  The Bridgeport, WV location made my order as quick as they could, and gave me a discount.  When I contacted the other store, they didn't give me any grief over cancelling the order.

name: Truth Hurts
text: Your employees are not using gloves to make food. I watched the chick with the light blue eyes touch money them go over and make my papadia with bare hands.

name: sierra linger
text: Great service, nice people, and great delivery people.  Zach Watson is nice and extra helpful in getting my order right.

name: Becca Ann
text: My family only ever orders Papa John's. I used to work for Papa Johns. As a delivery driver that also picks up from here, I always make sure my customers have plates, napkins, and little packets of crushed red pepper and parmesan cheese. I …More

name: Jason Casher
text: Pizza was excellent! Brownies were delicious! Had a large order and the crew had everything done very quickly!

name: Jon Beck
text: Not using gloves to prepare food. That's a health code violation and disgusting. I'm going  to report you to the health department.

name: Kerri Burrows
text: Well I've ordered from here for YEARS! They moved just a couple miles away.. of course they moved to the Bridgeport area and no longer deliver to my home. Which is only 5 miles from my house and before they were 4 miles from my house. So …More

name: Alex Canton
text: The best papa John's I have been to in a long time! They messed up on our order but they caught it before they even gave it to us.when they remade it they brought it out to our truck while it was raining. They were very nice and polite. Great customer service and timely.

name: Chad Perry
text: Great pizza. Decent price. Steep tax. Delivery

name: David Walker
text: Always good, always on time. I’ve been ordering from Papa John’s for years, both at the old location and now the new one. I’ve ordered mostly the specialty limited-time pizzas, and always love them. Drivers are always polite and on-time. Never any issues.

name: Jenny Moore
text: Good food, friendly service  & great timing!

Never had a problem till location changed to Bridgeport.

text: They have great pizza! Anchovy if you like and custom ingredients. A bit pricier than Dominos. You get what you pay for and you pay for what you get!

text: Took 55 minutes, then the order was incorrect. Was charged for additional side items, but didn’t receive them. Delivery is not the way to go, you are better off picking it up, so you can check your order.
